nodes.name: Lootable Spellbooks
nodes.summary: Adds spellbooks to the loot tables so that they can be found in various containers and held by NPCs. Reading a spellbook teaches the player the spell associated with the spellbook, offering an alternate method of learning spells instead of

nodes.name: Vampire and Werewolf Character Generation
nodes.summary: Prompts the user once (either at the time of character creation or the first time loading a pre-existing save) to ask if they want their character to be a vampire or a werewolf. For vampires, this includes a selection for which of the 3

nodes.name: Randomize Kagrenac's Tools
nodes.summary: This mod randomly places all three of Kagrenac's Tools (Wraithguard, Keening, and Sunder) across 10 potential pre-defined key locations within Ghostfence instead of their normal static locations. There is also a simpler version of this mod
